Description.Text:
From the sweetest smelling flowers in the lobby to the temptingly plumped sofas in the lounge, it's the attention to detail that makes The Colonnade in Little Venice distinctively different. Unusual touches include the JFK Suite, which features the bed made for John F. Kennedy's visit in 1962, and the Turing Suite, named after the mathematician responsible for breaking the Enigma code during World War II who was born here in 1912. Behind the beautiful Victorian faade of The Colonnade is a charming boutique hotel that is both elegant and distinguished in character. Built as two separate residences in 1865, The Colonnade continues to extend all the intimacy and comfort of a luxurious private home. The hotel has 43 guestrooms including eight suites, each carefully adorned in sumptuous fabrics and lavish antiques to uphold the unique ambiance prevalent throughout. Egyptian cotton linen adorns the beds and guests are provided with tea and coffee making facilities and cozy robes and slippers for those quiet, down-time moments.
The hotel is currently undergoing external renovations until 29th February 2012.

The townhouse hotel is situated in Little Venice, one of London's most scenic areas. It's next to the Regent's Canal, a real hidden treasure. London Underground station Warwick Avenue is opposite the hotel. The underground 15 minute underground journey to the shops and attractions of the West Ends' Marble Arch, Oxford Street, Piccadilly Circus and Trafalgar Square.

Deluxe - The room offers Double or Twin bed with Air conditioning, Bathrobe, Cable/Satellite TV, CD Player, Color TV, Disabled facilities, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Heating, Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, Kettle, Laundry service, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Pay-per-view movies, Radio, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone, Voicemail.
Petite/Small Room - The room offers small double bed more suitable for single occupancy with Air conditioning, Bathrobe, Cable/Satellite TV, CD Player, Color TV, Disabled facilities, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Heating, Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, Kettle, Laundry service, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Pay-per-view movies, Radio, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone, Voicemail.
Club - The room offers double bed with Air conditioning, Bathrobe, Cable/Satellite TV, CD Player, Color TV, Disabled facilities, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Heating, Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, Kettle, Laundry service, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Pay-per-view movies, Radio, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone, Voicemail.
Studio - The room offers double bed with Air conditioning, Bathrobe, Cable/Satellite TV, CD Player, Color TV, Disabled facilities, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Heating, Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, Kettle, Laundry service, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Pay-per-view movies, Radio, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone, Voicemail.
